articles.title: About
articles.contents: This site is an unofficial collection of posts related to the development of software to support the Argo international research program. Several projects related to this blog include argoFloats, argodata, and bgcArgoDMQC.

articles.title: Deployment Planning
articles.contents:
This page is used for Canadian Argo groups to coordinate deployment planning, in addition to OceanOps. To submit plans to the website, see instructions on the github page.
The map below shows completed and planned deployments for 2024, coloured by institution. Dots with a buoy symbol are locations of completed deployments (deployment location, not most recent profile location), while dots with the loading symbol are planned deployments.






Deployments since Jan 1, 2024
To date we have deployed 38 floats in 2024: 14 ARVOR-SBE, 1 ARVOR-RBR, 2 ARVOR+DO, 8 Deep ARVOR+DO,, 10 PROVOR CTS4, and 3 PROVOR CTS5.

articles.title: Argo Canada Sampling Plans
articles.contents:
On this page you will find definitions of the typical sampling plans Argo Canada uses for their floats depending on model, payload, and mission.
MetOcean
NOVA
nova-default
dova-default
NKE
ARVOR
arvor-core-default
arvor-doxy-default
arvor-rbr-1hz
PROVOR CTS4
provor-cts4-configx-default
provor-cts4-configy-default
provor-cts4-configz-default
PROVOR CTS5
provor-cts5-configx-default
provor-cts5-configx-colocate
provor-cts5-configx-deeppark
Teledyne-Webb
APEX
apex-historical
